title: We are unable to log you in because you may be offline.
body: I did the delete the delete gameflow-patcher-lock watched a bunch of videos on youtube followed all the steps and it still doesn't work for me please help this s*it is annoying.

replies.body:
That does sound super annoying :/ especially when you try out a bunch of steps and then nothing improves. 

If the [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) didn't help out, even after trying all the steps, then we might need a little help from our Tech team to figure out what's going on. [Send us a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and they can take it from there. :)
